Reviews.Title: Flat Screen
Reviews.Author: reagan224
Reviews.Content: Great Color!!  I would so buy this tv again and would recommend this brand to anyone.  In fact my mother has purchased the same television.

ProductInfo.Features:
22-inch LCD TV with hidden speakers
Dynamic contrast ratio 30,000:1
1 HDMI input, PC input, 1 component input
USB input for video, audio and digital pictures; Pause live TV with USB TimeShift
SRS TruSurround XT Sound; Sound leveler with distortion control; 2x3W output
22" Lcd Color Display
3D Digital Comb Filter
720P Resolution
Integrated Atsc/Ntsc/Qam Tuners
ProductInfo.Name: Haier HL22K2 Black 22-Inch K Series LCD HDTV
